data.text: @CodexKirk @BrennaSpencer Awww, isn’t that sweet or maybe it’s a way to keep her down and not look even hotter
@BrennaSpencer It’s not “cultural beauty” it just beauty - the law of attraction dictates

@BrennaSpencer In my experience, women tend to be Much more harsh on women's appearance than men. Speaking of sexism, the ship is sinking; when the Captain orders Women & Children first, does he get to ask if the woman is a feminists? 🤔
@BrennaSpencer All women are free to wear makeup or not!! The statement being made sexist and stereotyping!!
@BrennaSpencer I actually don’t like makeup on women. It looks too unnatural in most cases and takes away from natural beauty.
@BrennaSpencer I have never in my life felt that a woman should wear makeup. I dislike it and think it makes you look fake. I also do not think it’s men that are the reason women wear makeup.
@BrennaSpencer It's all about money duh
@BrennaSpencer BS. Men are held to a looks standard as well. How many men do you see in the gym or at CrossFit? Not a ton of ugly, fat dudes leaving the club with @BrennaSpencer. She’s got options.
@BrennaSpencer My wife hasn’t worn makeup since our wedding, 4 years ago. She is beautiful, and doesn’t give a damn.
@BrennaSpencer Not everyone is as pretty as you and me, Brenna.  :)
@BrennaSpencer Absolutely. I am sorry for saying that. I let politics get the better of my judgement. I'm sorry.
@BrennaSpencer Brenna that is because you don’t have to cover up ugly liberal emotions.

@RahulNuthakki You know absolutely nothing about me, so saying I don’t have a job is unkind. 

Have a good day!

@BrennaSpencer The thing is, I agree with a few things you say. But instead of having that going, you throw some wild shit into the mix and it's hard. I don't follow Kaitlyn Bennet, I follow you. Because you have some good things to say.
@BrennaSpencer I’m pretty sure trying to look your best at work is a universal axiom for both men and women.

@BrennaSpencer Brenna, I was never unkind to you. I may have made a few jokes. You routinely minimise big issues and act as if they don't exist. If you actually want to have a conversation about them, sure.

I follow you because I force myself to listen to opposing views. I'm trying tho. Lol

@RahulNuthakki “I believe in kindness” is actually in your bio. 😂

& since you seem to know so much about me.... I have a real job now & I had a real all through college.
@BrennaSpencer @tdbgolfer What #FakeNews ! I've forgotten to put makeup on & no1 even noticed. Does the mean I've got good skin or where very little makeup? Both
@BrennaSpencer Its easier to blame something else vs yourself
@BrennaSpencer DO YOU DARE APOLOGIZE FOR THIS
@BrennaSpencer You would know if you had a real job instead of shilling on Twitter fam.

@BrennaSpencer I always find this argument ridiculous. I have female friends that are physically attractive and ones that are not, but they have one important thing in common. They’re all good people that make me laugh.
@BrennaSpencer Pretty sure it's illegal for employers to force women to wear makeup.
I’m sorry but why do some women always have to find something to blame for them not advancing in their jobs
@BrennaSpencer make up is not a necessity.  My personal opinion is no one needs it.  Natural beauty is the best.  No one is ever 100% perfect. Its what makes everyone unique.
@BrennaSpencer We expect them to take showers too.
